channel.title: Problem whilest adding drops for new npc's(PI)
channel.description: I have a problem whilest adding in drops for NPC's that arn't included in NPChandler.java how do i do it? (i do have everything setup already except this part) source: deception(X) (PI) Edit: i've made the NPC spawn i've added the NPC + drops to the dropslist but it won't drop and i assume it has something to do with the NPChandler as far as i know. If i add it in i get this error on run.bat: [code]java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextline<Scanner.java:1516> at server.model.npcs.NPCdrops.Loaddrops<NPCDrops.java:37> at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init><NPCDrops.java15> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:70>[/code]

item.title: Problem whilest adding drops for new npc's(PI)
item.dc:creator: @loock31 loock31
item.description:
@loock31 wrote:

hmmm… i guess i could try to figure it out from here thanks, if this doesnt work ill edit this reply. EDIT: now i’m getting this error:

java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextline<Scanner.java:1516> at server.model.npcs.NPCdrops.Loaddrops<NPCDrops.java:37> at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init><NPCDrops.java15> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:70>

item.title: Problem whilest adding drops for new npc's(PI)
item.dc:creator: @loock31 loock31
item.description:
@loock31 wrote:

I have a problem whilest adding in drops for NPC’s that arn’t included in NPChandler.java
how do i do it? (i do have everything setup already except this part)
source: deception(X) (PI)
Edit:
i’ve made the NPC spawn
i’ve added the NPC + drops to the dropslist
but it won’t drop and i assume it has something to do with the NPChandler as far as i know.
If i add it in i get this error on run.bat:

java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextline<Scanner.java:1516> at server.model.npcs.NPCdrops.Loaddrops<NPCDrops.java:37> at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init><NPCDrops.java15> at server.Server.<clinit><Server.java:70>

Read full topic
